lyrics.text:
See the morning sun ascending, radiant in the eastern sky; hear the angel voices blending in their praise to God on high!
Alleluia! Alleluia! Glory be to God on high!

So may we, in lowly station, join the choristers above; singing with the whole creation, praising thee for thy great love.
Alleluia! Alleluia! Glory be to God above!

"Wisdom, honor, power, and blessing!" with the angelic host we cry; round thy throne, thy name confessing, Lord, we would to thee draw nigh.
Alleluia! Alleluia! Glory be to God on high!
